channel.title: Server not allowing more then two user's
channel.description: Now im pissed my server will not allow more then two players to log on and i checked the playerhandler.java and my max is 100.

item.title: Server not allowing more then two user's
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

[code]import java.io.*;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;

public class PlayerHandler {

// Remark: the player structures are just a temporary solution for now
// Later we will avoid looping through all the players for each player
// by making use of a hash table maybe based on map regions (8x8 granularity should be ok)
public static final int maxPlayers = 100;
public static Player players[] = new Player[maxPlayers];
public int playerSlotSearchStart = 1;			// where we start searching at when adding a new player
public static String kickNick = "";
public static boolean kickAllPlayers = false;
public static String messageToAll = "";
public static int playerCount=0;
public static String playersCurrentlyOn[] = new String[maxPlayers];
public static boolean updateAnnounced;
public static boolean updateRunning;
public static int updateSeconds;
public static long updateStartTime;

PlayerHandler() {
	for(int i = 0; i < maxPlayers; i++) {
		players[i] = null;
	}
}

[/code]

i added this before

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("jadpk")) { if(absY >= 3672 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness."); }
